classData.comment:
/**
 *
 * @class Neo.form.field.TextArea
 * @extends Neo.form.field.Text
 * @abstract
 */
classData.name: TextArea

classData.comment:
/**
     * Valid values for wrap
     * @member {String[]} wrapValues=['hard', 'off', 'soft', null]
     * @protected
     * @static
     */
classData.name: wrapValues

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.form.field.TextArea'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} ntype='textarea'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: ntype

classData.comment:
/**
         * Set this to `true` to have the text area grow and shrink to accommodate
         * any height of text. Bounds can be set using the `minHeight` and `maxHeight` settings.
         * @member {Boolean} autoGrow=false
         */
classData.description: Set this to true to have the text area grow and shrink to accommodate any height of text. Bounds can be set using the minHeight and maxHeight settings.
classData.name: autoGrow
baseCls

classData.comment:
/**
         * The visible width of the text control, in average character widths.
         * If it is specified, it must be a positive integer.
         * If it is not specified, the default value is 20.
         * @member {Number|null} cols_=null
         */
classData.description: The visible width of the text control, in average character widths. If it is specified, it must be a positive integer. If it is not specified, the default value is 20.
classData.name: cols_
inputTag_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Disabling to set a type for the textarea tag
         * See: inputTag_
         * @member {String|null} inputType=null
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: Disabling to set a type for the textarea tag See: inputTag_
classData.name: inputType

classData.comment:
/**
         * Use false to disable the browsers default resizing feature
         * @member {Boolean} resizable_=false
         */
classData.description: Use false to disable the browsers default resizing feature
classData.name: resizable_

classData.comment:
/**
         * An integer > 0 or null
         * @member {Number|null} rows_=3
         */
classData.name: rows_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Indicates how the control wraps text. Possible values are: hard, soft, off
         * If this attribute is not specified, soft is its default value.
         * https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/textarea
         * @member {String|null} wrap_=null
         */
classData.description: Indicates how the control wraps text. Possible values are: hard, soft, off If this attribute is not specified, soft is its default value. https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/textarea
classData.name: wrap_

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the cols config got changed
     * @param {Number|null} value
     * @param {Number|null} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the cols config got changed
classData.name: afterSetCols

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the inputTag config got changed
     * @param {String} value
     * @param {String} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the inputTag config got changed
classData.name: afterSetInputTag

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the mounted config got changed
     * @param {Boolean} value
     * @param {Boolean} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the mounted config got changed
classData.name: afterSetMounted

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the resizable config got changed
     * @param {Boolean} value
     * @param {Boolean} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the resizable config got changed
classData.name: afterSetResizable

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the rows config got changed
     * @param {Number|null} value
     * @param {Number|null} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the rows config got changed
classData.name: afterSetRows

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the value config got changed
     * @param {String} value
     * @param {String} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the value config got changed
classData.name: afterSetValue

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the wrap config got changed
     * @param {Number|null} value
     * @param {Number|null} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the wrap config got changed
classData.name: afterSetWrap

classData.comment:
/**
     * Checks if the new wrap value matches a value of the static wrapValues config
     * @param {String} value
     * @param {String} oldValue
     * @returns {String} value
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Checks if the new wrap value matches a value of the static wrapValues config
classData.name: beforeSetWrap
